name: code-firewall-mcp
description: Structural similarity-based code filter. Stops malicious code pattern reaching execution tools.

firewall_data_dir.title: Data Directory
firewall_data_dir.description: Directory for storing ChromaDB data and pattern collections

ollama_url.title: Ollama URL
ollama_url.description: URL of the Ollama server for embeddings

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model
embedding_model.description: Ollama model to use for embeddings (must support embed endpoint)

similarity_threshold.title: Block Threshold
similarity_threshold.description: Similarity threshold (0-1) above which code is blocked

tools.name: firewall_check
tools.description: Check if a code file is safe to execute

tools.name: firewall_check_code
tools.description: Check if code string is safe (no file required)

tools.name: firewall_blacklist
tools.description: Add a dangerous code pattern to the blacklist

tools.name: firewall_record_delta
tools.description: Record a near-miss variant for classifier sharpening

tools.name: firewall_list_patterns
tools.description: List patterns in blacklist or delta collection

tools.name: firewall_remove_pattern
tools.description: Remove a pattern from blacklist or deltas
